description: Gives or takes an advancement or criterion from players
Gets or modifies entity attributes like speed or health
Creates and manages custom boss bars on screen
Copies blocks from one area to another
Gets or modifies NBT data of blocks/entities/storage
Gives or removes status effects from entities
Executes commands with modified context and conditions
Fills a region with a specific block
Runs all commands in a function file
Sends private message to specific players
example_usage: msg @p Hello! This is a private message.

description: Plays a sound for specified players

example_usage: say Server will restart in 5 minutes!

description: Manages scoreboard objectives and player scores
Places a block at specific coordinates
Sends formatted JSON message to players
Replaces or modifies items in inventories
example_usage: item replace entity @p weapon.mainhand with minecraft:diamond_sword

description: Forces chunks to be loaded constantly
Schedules function to run at specific time
Unlocks or locks recipes for players
Sets default game mode for new players
